item.description:
Understanding food addictions & green juicing your way to better health with Michael Bergonzi of Hippocrates!

 

Food is an addiction and can be challenging both socially and emotionally. How does one switch from solid food to juicing and what are the benefits? Michael has spent the last 10 of his 20 year career at Hippocrates Health Institute teaching others about growing wheatgrass and lecturing on why juicing is essential in today’s world.  Learn all about what juicers are best, why greens are essential for optimum health, what to juice, how to juice, how long to juice as well as eating simple & with better choices as well as a basic overview on how to sprout with an emphasis on wheatgrass. 

Learn more about Michael:

www.wheatgrassgreenhouse.com
item.name: Understanding Food Addictions, Green Juicing & Sprouting with Michael Bergonzi
